Description: Identifies the type of dwelling involved in the sale
Linear feet of street connected to property
Lot size in square feet
Rates the overall material and finish of the house (1-10)
Rates the overall condition of the house (1-10)
Original construction date
Remodel date (same as construction date if no remodeling or additions)
Above grade (ground) living area square feet
Total square feet of basement area
First Floor square feet
Second floor square feet
Full bathrooms above grade
Half baths above grade
Bedrooms above grade (does NOT include basement bedrooms)
Kitchens above grade
Total rooms above grade (does not include bathrooms)
Number of fireplaces
Size of garage in car capacity
Size of garage in square feet
Pool area in square feet
Total square footage = TotalBsmtSF + 1stFlrSF + 2ndFlrSF
Total bathrooms = FullBath + 0.5*HalfBath + BsmtFullBath + 0.5*BsmtHalfBath
Age of house = YrSold - YearBuilt
Years since remodel = YrSold - YearRemodAdd
Total porch area = OpenPorchSF + EnclosedPorch + 3SsnPorch + ScreenPorch
Binary indicator if house has a pool (1=Yes 0=No)
Binary indicator if house has second floor (1=Yes 0=No)
Binary indicator if house has garage (1=Yes 0=No)
Binary indicator if house has basement (1=Yes 0=No)
Binary indicator if house has fireplace (1=Yes 0=No)
Interaction feature = OverallQual × OverallCond
Evaluates the height of the basement (0=None to 5=Excellent)
Evaluates the quality of the material on the exterior (1-5)
Kitchen quality (1-5)
Physical locations within Ames city limits
Type of dwelling
Style of dwelling
Proximity to various conditions (main road railroad etc)
Type of sale
Condition of sale
Year sold (YYYY)
Month sold (MM)
